step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your elbows a bit closer together in this first step.
Your elbows are a little far apart. Try to bring them closer to your head as you raise your hands.
Excellent! You've got a great spread with your elbows wide and hands behind your head.
Well done holding the stretch. Your shoulders look stable and upright.
Good return. Try to keep your elbows from drifting too wide as you come back down.
Second rep starting well. Focus on keeping those elbows close together.
Good movement. Aim to keep your elbows a bit closer to your head in this phase.
Great job! Your elbows are nicely spread, and your shoulders are stable.
Holding the stretch effectively. Your head is upright, which is perfect.
Nice finish! Just be mindful of keeping your elbows from spreading too much on the way down.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the Clasp and Spread exercise! Remember to keep your elbows close to your head when raising your hands and spreading them wide. This helps maximize the stretch and lymph movement.
